articles.title: Bank of Ireland upgrades income guidance following ECB rate hikes - Independent.ie
articles.description: Bank of Ireland has significantly upgraded its guidance for net interest income (NII) in 2022 as the benefits of dramatic European Central Bank (ECB) rate hikes flow through to the Irish banking sector.
